萌新问一下，秘银圣所怎么没了，就是一串英文没有东西可以换的

The actual Game itself is not bad. It is quite the Opposite. The Gameplay is addicting, fun and even inovative. The Idea of a 4vs1 asymetrical Horror Game is great and a lot of Fun especially with Friends. There are always new things to find and to do and some of the greatest Memories come from this Game ..., but still I would not recommend bying »Dead by Daylight«. Why? It is fairly simple. 

1. The Devs are not listening to the Feedback they are getting. They do not care about the on average 50000 Players playing their Game. They are only incorporating into the Game what they want and by doing so, they are destroying so many of the good, already existing Mechanics. With that, the Game is not consistent. Perks are getting thrown around and changed that have been in this Game for several Years, making it hard for the Players to know what Version of one specific perk is active at the Moment. 

2. The Devs are all Killer-Mains. »Dead by Daylight« is heavily onesided towards the Killers, because that's the Freference of the Developers. With every new Update they are nerving the Surivors. Yes, they are also sometimes nerving specific Killer Mechanics, but overall every new Chapter is harder on the Survivors and yet, the Survivors win, giving the Developers more Reasons to nerv them. The Devs of this Game apparently haven't understood, that they created a 4vs1, obviously the Survivors are stronger. They are outnumbering and Time has shown that the Survivor-Players learn to adapt. Even without nerved Perks and nerved Mechanics the Survivors would still win against a highrank Killer with a lot of strong Perks. By constantly nerving the Surviors, they are taking the Fun away for them. And this is comming from someone who has 1600 Hours 50/50 in Killers and Survivors.

3. They created a toxic Environment. The entire Game Community is toxic. You are getting hated if you are good and you are getting hated, if you are bad. You are getting hated for bringing an Item, you are getting hated for not bringing an Item. You are getting hated for saving and for not saving, for distracting the Killer, not distracting the Killer, for being friendly and for not being friendly, for helping and for not helping. And this is not onesided, it affects all Players, Killers and Survivors. And the Devs don't do anything against that. 

4. But they are doing something against being friendly. You can be banned if you as a Killer decide to not be cruel, but to simply be friendly, for example when there is an upcomming Event. And it is not the Survivors who don't like that. The Survivors love it. They behave like Flies around molding Fruits when there is a friendly Killer. But no, the Devs don't like it when their Players are having fun. 

5. And lastly, ... »Dead by Daylight« is the Game with the most Bugs I have ever seen. Hits go through Walls and the Hitboxes of the Survivors are incredibly large. Bugs make the Trials sometimes unbrearable. And with every new patch that apparently "fixes" those Bugs, ten more Bugs make their way into the Game and no one knows why. So everytime the Devs try to "fix" something, they destroy more Stuff. And by now it simply becomes annoying. Seeing that after 1600 Hours and 4 entire Years, the same Bugs are still making a Trial horrible, it is just sad at this Point. 

In the end ... am I still investing Money into this Game because I already have more than 1600 hours? Yes. Am I recommending it? No. And if you really don't care about being harassed, insulted, teabagged, facecamped and tunneled to Death and hated for being a good Person, then sure, go ahead and buy the Game, but do not pay the full Prize for it. You can get the base Game and all the overprized Chapters on different Websites for only a few Bucks. 
Oh yeah, if you buy everything as it is ... you will spend 100 Bucks for this Game. It is not worth 10. 

And now, with these legendary words and a lot of sarcasm, ... I think they did a pretty good job so far.

O jogo tem quatro pesos:
1 - É um bom game para quem quer jogar com AMIGOS! Se está pensando em jogar online com outros jogadores, pode esquecer. 
2 - Os jogadores ficam entrando e saindo da sala, isso atrasa o inicio da partida. Muitos não clicam em "PRONTO" e a partida fica presa e você tem que sair e entrar de novo para achar uma nova. Quando clica em "entrar em uma sala" as vezes volta para a tela de seleção de personagem. Ai você clica de novo, e ele fica voltando. Quando encontra uma sala, as vezes aparece: "você foi desconectado do HOST" e volta para a tela de seleção de personagem. 
3 - Por se tratar de multiplayer online, tem que ficar na boa vontade de achar gente pra jogar, e esse não é o maior problema. O jogo não é barato para você pagar e se decepcionar depois. 
4 - Prepare o bolso, pois o jogo recebe uma avalanche de DLC. Cada personagem novo é uma DLC. Ou seja: o jogo sai mais caro do que você planejava.

Игра в целом была не плохая для 2020 года, но дальше пошёл какой-то пиздец, разрабы просто клали такой огромный хуй на камьюнити и конвеером выпускали новые главы, хотя в игре есть проблемы которые они могли бы решить например сделать нормальнаю оптимизацию, но они вместо этого просто подтянули графику!

Vamos a ver este juego es muuuuuuuuy bueno, adictivo, de mucha estrategia, definitivamente es un juego para pasar DEMACIADAS horas de diversion solo o con amigos a poder ser para mucha mas diversion, me atrevo a dar mi valoracion en positivo; Por que ? por que tengo casi 1000 horas jugadas a el creo que de no haberme gustado lo hubiera dejado en el olvido.

Problemas del juego ? 

Este juego tiene 2 problemas muy grandes, 

1.- Uno de ellos es que los servers son Host, diras pues eso en que me afecta? si solo con entrar a la sala y ver que mi ping es muy alto salgo de la sala busco nueva reviso y repito hasta encontrar una con buen ping, pues no aqui no terminan tus problemas con esos MS de mas, una vez en partida el asesino para tener una pequeña gran ventaja extra (esto es trampa señores nunca hagan eso) pueden simplemente poner a descargar algun juego mientras juegan o a cargar una pelicula etc, JA! Mira nada mas ! Ademas es campero ! Oooow espera ! Es tunnelero !!!!!!!!!!!!!! Pues si esta es la otra cosa negativa que tiene que no pueden hacer nada encontra de ellos, por que ? Pues facil es una forma de juego cada quien juega como quiere, como asi en tu equipo puede tocarte unos survivor muy malos, aver vamos a ver nada nacio sabiendo jugar este juego pero deberian de poner un MM que sea rango y nivel de cuenta YO me incluyo tambien me eh derankeado para troll al asesino hasta mas no poder pero bueno de ahí en mas todo bien.
Oooow espera olvide decir que tambien en la sala de espera estando los 4 survivor si alguno se sale por alguna razon, SORPRESA tu sala esta bug y no entrara ningun survivor mas hasta que un segundo servivor abandone la sala y taran!!!! se unen al instante 2 servivor a tu sala(Por favor arreglenlo !!!!)

2.- (?) 
Definitivamente es un juego para jugarlo en graficos alto-ultra cual es el problema ? No es muy optimizado que digamos yo teniendo una pc gamma media alta no puedo jugarlo en ultra;
Mi pc es un i5 4ta gen a 3.1 GHz, una tarjeta grafica 1050ti 4gb, 16 gb ram, ssd 250gb, 
un amigo  tuvo que modificar archivor para bajar aun mas la resolucion a -100, diras es enserio ? Si lo es era un juego completamente distinto.

Pero de ver es un juego muuuy bueno me atrevo a decir que es mi juego favorito +9 en calificacion

Oyun güzel ve kendine bağlıyor. Ama özellikle jeneratörlere etki eden özellikleri bulunan katiller fazlasıyla avantajlı duruma geçiyor. Bir jeneratörü aralıksız 3-4 dakikada anca yapıyoruz. Böyle bir oyunda Türkçe seçeneğinin olmaması da başka bir eksi durum. Fakat kendine bağlayan, vaktin hızlı geçmesini sağlayan güzel bir oyun.

It's a cool experience and for me, each match is unique. Sometimes the survivors really beat me down, sometimes i beat them mercilessly. I wouldn't say this game has a toxic community as some retards have said. It's hard to label that when the only time you talk is before and after a match.  Most of the time all I see is gg or asking what they could improve on with their play.  Pretty great experience and way more exciting than the Friday the 13th game and a fraction of the price.

I do not like this game. it is far too scary and i hate that one guy with the white mask. like seriously tho, why cant all the survivors just team up on the killer. its a 1v4 and i bet you could make some deadly weapons out of the generator parts or something along the lines of that. i think i speak for everyone that plays this game for this next part. everyone will disconnect from the game if there is a freddy. he is one of the most annoying killers because he can tunnel immensely. i literally shit my pants the first time i got him in a game and i needed to put some new ones on for the next because the fumes were making me dizzy. ive also had a close encouter with leatherface which ended in me pissing myself. i didnt really feel like changing my pants so i just flipped them backwards and kept on gaming! yes that does sound a little primitive but its what you have to do if you are commited to a game. i am now known to my friends as shit dick for some reason.

Come for the mutilation, stay for the salt. Game is somewhat unblanced and developers are too eager to appease the 4/5 of the playerbase (e.g. addition of SWF and Freddy nerf). At low (or high in this game's nomenclature) ranks it's fun though.

Devs ruined their own game by implementing a new ranking system that is completely broken and no one asked for.
Stay FAR away from this game as long as this issue persists.
I will update this review if anything changes for the better.
